text: Reggie Diergaardt (born September 9, 1957 in Upington, Northern Cape) is a Namibian politician and former member of the National Assembly of Namibia. Prior to Namibian independence in 1990, Diergaardt was the leader of the Labour Party and one of the founding members of the United Democratic Front. He served in the Constituent Assembly of Namibia on a UDF ticket from 1990 to 1995. ==References== Category:1957 births Category:Living people Category:Coloured Namibian people Category:People from Upington Category:United Democratic Front (Namibia) politicians Category:Namibian people of South African descent Category:Members of the National Assembly (Namibia)
title: Reggie Diergaardt
